ygData.subject: the BBC
ygData.msgSnippet: the bone bladed claymore is on a troll sk in lvl 3 befallen. if you have been to the bottom of the well, you have passed very close to him. as you pass thru
ygData.messageBody:
the bone bladed claymore is on a troll sk in lvl 3 befallen. if you have
been to the bottom of the well, you have passed very close to him. as you
pass thru the false wall in lvl 3, the troll is down the path to the right.
despite what anybody may tell you about the troll being a badass, it is only
lvl 15 and not terribly menacing. the problem is that he often spawns with
ghouls and theurges and ice bones as friends.

as for the new patch saying that vampiric embrace is fixed.. YAY! i am 3
bubs from 22.. if that makes me the highest level on this mailing list, i
will work on getting the level in a day or two and let you know what happens.

Beld Demonblade
Fennin Ro
